content: I was too devastated about The Toast to estimate on Friday, but here’s how the weekend went: Friday: $0!Saturday: $2.40 for a shirt (I had a gift card for the rest of the cost), $20 for Chinese food that was not nearly spicy enough, I should have just ordered like 17 egg rolls insteadSunday: $113 for groceries because we didn’t go shopping last week, $32 for gas Total: $167.40
